title: Print, ca. 1980 reproduction print of 1925 original
medium: Color lithograph on heavy white wove paper
markings: Publisher's monogram embossed, lower right:  FM [Franca Manchini]
signed: Printed in gray ink, below image  lower right:  BALLA/FUTURISTA
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, beneath image, lower left: 45 [over]150
description: Multicolored image of complete set with sketchy pastel-colored figures in middle on either side of a triangular form, surrounded by red, orange, blue, yellow large rounded forms.  Curtain suggested in blue-black on all sides except lower eldge.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, ca. 1980 reproduction print of 1925 original.
ca. 1980 reproduction print of 1925 original. Color lithograph on heavy white wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen. 1999-6-5-22.
